    return 0;

program10.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    x = 5;
    y = 10;
    if (x < y) {
        return 1;
    } else {
        return 0;
    }
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                y
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               5
     11   BROJ               10
     12   KR_IF              if
     13   OP_LT              <
     14   KR_RETURN          return
     15   BROJ               1
     16   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     17   KR_ELSE            else
     18   BROJ               0

program11.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x >= 5) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               5
     10   KR_IF              if
     11   OP_GTE             >=
     12   KR_RETURN          return
     13   BROJ               1
     14   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     15   BROJ               0

program12.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x <= 5) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               5
     10   KR_IF              if
     11   OP_LTE             <=
     12   KR_RETURN          return
     13   BROJ               1
     14   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     15   BROJ               0

program13.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x == 5) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               5
     10   KR_IF              if
     11   OP_EQ              ==
     12   KR_RETURN          return
     13   BROJ               1
     14   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     15   BROJ               0

program14.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x != 0) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}

program15.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    x = 5;
    y = 10;
    if (x > 0 && y > 0) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                y
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               5
     11   BROJ               10
     12   KR_IF              if
     13   OP_GT              >
     14   BROJ               0
     15   OP_I               &&
     16   KR_RETURN          return
     17   BROJ               1
     18   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

niz uniformnih znakova:
uniformni znak    redak    indeks u tablicu znakova

program16.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    x = 0;
    y = 10;
    if (x > 0 || y > 0) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                y
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               0
     11   BROJ               10
     12   KR_IF              if
     13   OP_GT              >
     14   OP_ILI             ||
     15   KR_RETURN          return
     16   BROJ               1
     17   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

niz uniformnih znakova:
uniformni znak    redak    indeks u tablicu znakova

program17.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (!(x == 0)) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               5
     10   KR_IF              if
     11   OP_NEG             !
     12   OP_EQ              ==
     13   BROJ               0
     14   KR_RETURN          return
     15   BROJ               1
     16   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program18.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    i = 0;
    while (i < 10) {
        i = i + 1;
    }
    return i;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               0
     10   KR_WHILE           while
     11   OP_LT              <
     12   BROJ               10
     13   PLUS               +
     14   BROJ               1
     15   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     16   KR_RETURN          return

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    i = 0;
    while (i < 5) {
        i = i + 1;
        if (i == 3) {
            break;
        }
    }
    return i;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               0
     10   KR_WHILE           while
     11   OP_LT              <
     12   BROJ               5
     13   PLUS               +
     14   BROJ               1
     15   KR_IF              if
     16   OP_EQ              ==
     17   BROJ               3
     18   KR_BREAK           break
     19   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     20   KR_RETURN          return

program2.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    return x;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst

     4   D_ZAGRADA          )

     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               5
     10   KR_RETURN          return
     11   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program20.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    i = 0;
    while (i < 10) {
        i = i + 1;
        if (i % 2 == 0) {
            continue;
        }
    }
    return i;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               0
     10   KR_WHILE           while
     11   OP_LT              <
     12   BROJ               10
     13   PLUS               +
     14   BROJ               1
     15   KR_IF              if
     16   OP_MOD             %
     17   BROJ               2
     18   OP_EQ              ==
     19   KR_CONTINUE        continue
     20   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     21   KR_RETURN          return

program21.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    for (i = 0; i < 10; i = i + 1) {
    }
    return i;
}

tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;

     10   BROJ               0
     11   OP_LT              <
     12   BROJ               10
     13   PLUS               +
     14   BROJ               1
     15   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     16   KR_RETURN          return

program22.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    int sum;
    sum = 0;
    for (i = 1; i <= 10; i = i + 1) {
        sum = sum + i;
    }
    return sum;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                sum
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               0
     11   KR_FOR             for
     12   BROJ               1
     13   OP_LTE             <=
     14   BROJ               10
     15   PLUS               +
     16   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     17   KR_RETURN          return

program23.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    for (i = 0; i < 10; i = i + 1) {
        if (i == 5) {
            break;
        }
    }
    return i;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   KR_FOR             for
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               0
     11   OP_LT              <
     12   BROJ               10
     13   PLUS               +
     14   BROJ               1
     15   KR_IF              if
     16   OP_EQ              ==
     17   BROJ               5
     18   KR_BREAK           break
     19   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     20   KR_RETURN          return

program24.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    for (i = 0; i < 10; i = i + 1) {
        if (i % 2 == 0) {
            continue;
        }
    }
    return i;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;

     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =

     20   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program25.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int add(int a, int b) {
    return a + b;
}

int main(void) {
    int result;
    result = add(5, 3);
    return result;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                add
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                a
     4   ZAREZ              ,
     5   IDN                b
     6   D_ZAGRADA          )
     7   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     8   KR_RETURN          return
     9   PLUS               +
     10   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     11   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     12   IDN                main
     13   KR_VOID            void
     14   IDN                result
     15   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     16   BROJ               5
     17   BROJ               3

program26.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int multiply(int x, int y) {
    return x * y;
}

int main(void) {
    int a;
    int b;
    int product;
    a = 7;
    b = 6;
    product = multiply(a, b);
    return product;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                multiply
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                x
     4   ZAREZ              ,
     5   IDN                y
     6   D_ZAGRADA          )
     7   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     8   KR_RETURN          return
     9   ASTERISK           *
     10   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     11   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     12   IDN                main
     13   KR_VOID            void
     14   IDN                a
     15   IDN                b
     16   IDN                product
     17   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     18   BROJ               7
     19   BROJ               6

program27.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
void print_hello(void) {
    return;
}

int main(void) {
    print_hello();
    return 0;
}

program28.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int square(int x) {
    return x * x;
}

int main(void) {
    int n;
    int result;
    n = 5;
    result = square(n);
    return result;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                square
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                x
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )

program29.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int max(int a, int b) {
    if (a > b) {
        return a;
    } else {
        return b;
    }
}

int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    int m;
    x = 10;
    y = 20;
    m = max(x, y);
    return m;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                max
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                a
     4   ZAREZ              ,
     5   IDN                b
     6   D_ZAGRADA          )
     7   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     8   KR_IF              if
     9   OP_GT              >
     10   KR_RETURN          return
     11   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     12   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     13   KR_ELSE            else
     14   IDN                main
     15   KR_VOID            void
     16   IDN                x
     17   IDN                y
     18   IDN                m
     19   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     20   BROJ               10
     21   BROJ               20

program3.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int a;
    int b;
    int sum;
    a = 10;
    b = 20;
    sum = a + b;
    return sum;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                a
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                b
     9   IDN                sum
     10   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     11   BROJ               10
     12   BROJ               20
     13   PLUS               +
     14   KR_RETURN          return
     15   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

niz uniformnih znakova:
uniformni znak    redak    indeks u tablicu znakova
KR_INT                 1       0
IDN                    1       1
L_ZAGRADA              1       2
KR_VOID                1       3
D_ZAGRADA              1       4
L_VIT_ZAGRADA          1       5
KR_INT                 2       0
IDN                    2       6
TOCKAZAREZ             2       7
KR_INT                 3       0
IDN                    3       8
TOCKAZAREZ             3       7
KR_INT                 4       0
IDN                    4       9
TOCKAZAREZ             4       7
IDN                    5       6

program30.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int min(int a, int b) {
    if (a < b) {
        return a;
    }
    return b;
}

int main(void) {
    return min(15, 8);
}
Lexical Tokens

indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                min
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                a
     4   ZAREZ              ,
     5   IDN                b
     6   D_ZAGRADA          )
     7   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     8   KR_IF              if
     9   OP_LT              <
     10   KR_RETURN          return
     11   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     12   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     13   IDN                main
     14   KR_VOID            void
     15   BROJ               15
     16   BROJ               8

program31.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
char get_char(void) {
    return 'a';
}

int main(void) {
    char c;
    c = get_char();
    return 0;
}

program33.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int factorial(int n) {
    if (n <= 1) {
        return 1;
    }
    return n * factorial(n - 1);
}

int main(void) {
    int result;
    result = factorial(5);
    return result;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                factorial
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                n
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   KR_IF              if
     7   OP_LTE             <=
     8   BROJ               1
     9   KR_RETURN          return
     10   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     11   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     12   ASTERISK           *
     13   MINUS              -
     14   IDN                main
     15   KR_VOID            void
     16   IDN                result
     17   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     18   BROJ               5

program34.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int fibonacci(int n) {
    if (n <= 1) {
        return n;
    }
    return fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2);
}

int main(void) {
    int result;
    result = fibonacci(6);
    return result;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                fibonacci
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                n
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   KR_IF              if
     7   OP_LTE             <=
     8   BROJ               1
     9   KR_RETURN          return
     10   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     11   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     12   MINUS              -
     13   PLUS               +
     14   BROJ               2
     15   IDN                main
     16   KR_VOID            void
     17   IDN                result
     18   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     19   BROJ               6

program35.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int sum_array(int arr[], int n) {
    int i;
    int sum;
    sum = 0;
    for (i = 0; i < n; i = i + 1) {
        sum = sum + arr[i];
    }
    return sum;
}

int main(void) {
    int arr[5];
    arr[0] = 1;
    arr[1] = 2;
    arr[2] = 3;
    arr[3] = 4;
    arr[4] = 5;
    return sum_array(arr, 5);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                sum_array
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                arr
     4   L_UGL_ZAGRADA      [
     5   D_UGL_ZAGRADA      ]
     6   ZAREZ              ,
     7   IDN                n
     8   D_ZAGRADA          )
     9   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     10   IDN                i
     11   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     12   IDN                sum
     13   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     14   BROJ               0
     15   KR_FOR             for
     16   OP_LT              <
     17   PLUS               +
     18   BROJ               1
     19   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     20   KR_RETURN          return
     21   IDN                main
     22   KR_VOID            void
     23   BROJ               5
     24   BROJ               2
     25   BROJ               3
     26   BROJ               4

program36.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int power(int base, int exp) {
    if (exp == 0) {
        return 1;
    }
    return base * power(base, exp - 1);
}

int main(void) {
    return power(2, 4);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                power
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                base
     4   ZAREZ              ,
     5   IDN                exp
     6   D_ZAGRADA          )
     7   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     8   KR_IF              if
     9   OP_EQ              ==
     10   BROJ               0
     11   KR_RETURN          return
     12   BROJ               1
     13   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     14   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     15   ASTERISK           *
     16   MINUS              -
     17   IDN                main
     18   KR_VOID            void
     19   BROJ               2
     20   BROJ               4

program37.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int gcd(int a, int b) {
    if (b == 0) {
        return a;
    }
    return gcd(b, a % b);
}

int main(void) {
    return gcd(48, 18);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                gcd
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                a
     4   ZAREZ              ,
     5   IDN                b
     6   D_ZAGRADA          )
     7   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     8   KR_IF              if
     9   OP_EQ              ==
     10   BROJ               0
     11   KR_RETURN          return
     12   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     13   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     14   OP_MOD             %
     15   IDN                main
     16   KR_VOID            void
     17   BROJ               48
     18   BROJ               18

program38.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    int j;
    int sum;
    sum = 0;
    for (i = 0; i < 3; i = i + 1) {
        for (j = 0; j < 3; j = j + 1) {
            sum = sum + 1;
        }
    }
    return sum;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                j
     9   IDN                sum
     10   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     11   BROJ               0
     12   KR_FOR             for
     13   OP_LT              <
     14   BROJ               3
     15   PLUS               +
     16   BROJ               1
     17   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     18   KR_RETURN          return

program39.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    x = 5;
    y = 10;
    if (x > 0) {
        if (y > 0) {
            return 1;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                y
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               5
     11   BROJ               10
     12   KR_IF              if
     13   OP_GT              >
     14   BROJ               0
     15   KR_RETURN          return
     16   BROJ               1
     17   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

niz uniformnih znakova:

program4.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    x = 5;
    y = 3;
    return x - y;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                y
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               5
     11   BROJ               3
     12   KR_RETURN          return
     13   MINUS              -
     14   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program40.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    int j;
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i = i + 1) {
        for (j = 0; j < 5; j = j + 1) {
            if (i == j) {
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    return i;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                j
     9   KR_FOR             for
     10   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     11   BROJ               0
     12   OP_LT              <
     13   BROJ               5
     14   PLUS               +
     15   BROJ               1
     16   KR_IF              if
     17   OP_EQ              ==
     18   KR_BREAK           break
     19   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     20   KR_RETURN          return

program41.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
struct Point {
    int x;
    int y;
};

int main(void) {
    struct Point p;
    p.x = 10;
    p.y = 20;
    return p.x + p.y;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_STRUCT          struct
     1   IDN                Point
     2   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     3   KR_INT             int
     4   IDN                x
     5   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     6   IDN                y
     7   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     8   IDN                main
     9   L_ZAGRADA          (
     10   KR_VOID            void
     11   D_ZAGRADA          )
     12   IDN                p
     13   TOCKA              .
     14   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     15   BROJ               10
     16   BROJ               20
     17   KR_RETURN          return
     18   PLUS               +

program42.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
struct Rectangle {
    int width;
    int height;
};

int area(struct Rectangle r) {
    return r.width * r.height;
}

int main(void) {
    struct Rectangle rect;
    rect.width = 5;
    rect.height = 10;
    return area(rect);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_STRUCT          struct
     1   IDN                Rectangle
     2   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     3   KR_INT             int
     4   IDN                width
     5   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     6   IDN                height
     7   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     8   IDN                area
     9   L_ZAGRADA          (
     10   IDN                r
     11   D_ZAGRADA          )
     12   KR_RETURN          return
     13   TOCKA              .
     14   ASTERISK           *
     15   IDN                main
     16   KR_VOID            void
     17   IDN                rect
     18   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     19   BROJ               5
     20   BROJ               10

program43.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
struct Node {
    int value;
    int next;
};

int main(void) {
    struct Node node;
    node.value = 42;
    node.next = 0;
    return node.value;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_STRUCT          struct
     1   IDN                Node
     2   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     3   KR_INT             int
     4   IDN                value
     5   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     6   IDN                next
     7   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

     9   L_ZAGRADA          (
     10   KR_VOID            void
     11   D_ZAGRADA          )
     12   IDN                node
     13   TOCKA              .
     14   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     15   BROJ               42
     16   BROJ               0
     17   KR_RETURN          return

program44.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    x = x + 1;
    return x;
}

int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    x = x - 1;
    return x;
}

int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 10;
    x = x - 3;
    return x;
}

tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst

     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               10
     10   MINUS              -
     11   BROJ               3
     12   KR_RETURN          return
     13   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program48.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    x = x * 2;
    return x;
}

int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 20;
    x = x / 4;
    return x;
}

program5.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int a;
    int b;
    int result;
    a = 7;
    b = 3;
    result = a * b;
    return result;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                a
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                b
     9   IDN                result
     10   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     11   BROJ               7
     12   BROJ               3
     13   ASTERISK           *
     14   KR_RETURN          return
     15   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program50.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 17;
    x = x % 5;
    return x;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               17
     10   OP_MOD             %
     11   BROJ               5
     12   KR_RETURN          return
     13   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program51.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    x++;
    return x;
}

int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    x--;
    return x;
}

program53.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    x = 5;
    y = ++x;
    return y;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                y
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               5
     11   OP_INC             ++
     12   KR_RETURN          return
     13   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program55.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int arr[10];
    int i;
    for (i = 0; i < 10; i = i + 1) {
        arr[i] = i * 2;
    }
    return arr[5];
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                arr
     7   L_UGL_ZAGRADA      [
     8   BROJ               10
     9   D_UGL_ZAGRADA      ]
     10   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     11   IDN                i
     12   KR_FOR             for
     13   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     14   BROJ               0
     15   OP_LT              <
     16   PLUS               +
     17   BROJ               1
     18   ASTERISK           *
     19   BROJ               2
     20   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     21   KR_RETURN          return
     22   BROJ               5

program56.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    char c;
    c = 'A';
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   KR_CHAR            char
     7   IDN                c
     8   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   ZNAK               'A'
     11   KR_RETURN          return
     12   BROJ               0
     13   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program58.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
const int MAX = 100;

int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = MAX;
    return x;
}

tablica znakova:

     9   D_ZAGRADA          )

     12   KR_RETURN          return

program59.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    const int x = 5;
    return x;
}

tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst

     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   KR_CONST           const
     7   IDN                x
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               5
     10   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     11   KR_RETURN          return
     12   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program6.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int a;
    int b;
    int result;
    a = 15;
    b = 3;
    result = a / b;
    return result;
}

program60.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int find_max(int arr[], int n) {
    int i;
    int max_val;
    max_val = arr[0];
    for (i = 1; i < n; i = i + 1) {
        if (arr[i] > max_val) {
            max_val = arr[i];
        }
    }
    return max_val;
}

int main(void) {
    int arr[5];
    arr[0] = 3;
    arr[1] = 7;
    arr[2] = 2;
    arr[3] = 9;
    arr[4] = 1;
    return find_max(arr, 5);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                find_max
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                arr
     4   L_UGL_ZAGRADA      [
     5   D_UGL_ZAGRADA      ]
     6   ZAREZ              ,
     7   IDN                n
     8   D_ZAGRADA          )
     9   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     10   IDN                i
     11   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     12   IDN                max_val
     13   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     14   BROJ               0
     15   KR_FOR             for
     16   BROJ               1
     17   OP_LT              <
     18   PLUS               +
     19   KR_IF              if
     20   OP_GT              >
     21   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

     26   BROJ               3
     27   BROJ               7
     28   BROJ               2
     29   BROJ               9
     30   BROJ               4

program61.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int linear_search(int arr[], int n, int key) {
    int i;
    for (i = 0; i < n; i = i + 1) {
        if (arr[i] == key) {
            return i;
        }
    }
    return -1;
}

int main(void) {
    int arr[5];
    arr[0] = 10;
    arr[1] = 20;
    arr[2] = 30;
    arr[3] = 40;
    arr[4] = 50;
    return linear_search(arr, 5, 30);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                linear_search
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                arr
     4   L_UGL_ZAGRADA      [
     5   D_UGL_ZAGRADA      ]
     6   ZAREZ              ,
     7   IDN                n
     8   IDN                key
     9   D_ZAGRADA          )
     10   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     11   IDN                i
     12   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     13   KR_FOR             for
     14   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     15   BROJ               0
     16   OP_LT              <
     17   PLUS               +
     18   BROJ               1
     19   KR_IF              if
     20   OP_EQ              ==
     21   KR_RETURN          return
     22   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     23   MINUS              -
     24   IDN                main
     25   KR_VOID            void
     26   BROJ               5
     27   BROJ               10
     28   BROJ               20
     29   BROJ               2
     30   BROJ               30
     31   BROJ               3
     32   BROJ               40
     33   BROJ               4
     34   BROJ               50

program62.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int binary_search_recursive(int arr[], int left, int right, int key) {
    int mid;
    if (left > right) {
        return -1;
    }
    mid = (left + right) / 2;
    if (arr[mid] == key) {
        return mid;
    }
    if (arr[mid] > key) {
        return binary_search_recursive(arr, left, mid - 1, key);
    }
    return binary_search_recursive(arr, mid + 1, right, key);
}

int main(void) {
    int arr[5];
    arr[0] = 1;
    arr[1] = 3;
    arr[2] = 5;
    arr[3] = 7;
    arr[4] = 9;
    return binary_search_recursive(arr, 0, 4, 5);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                binary_search_recursive
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                arr
     4   L_UGL_ZAGRADA      [
     5   D_UGL_ZAGRADA      ]
     6   ZAREZ              ,
     7   IDN                left
     8   IDN                right
     9   IDN                key
     10   D_ZAGRADA          )
     11   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     12   IDN                mid
     13   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     14   KR_IF              if
     15   OP_GT              >
     16   KR_RETURN          return
     17   MINUS              -
     18   BROJ               1
     19   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     20   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     21   PLUS               +
     22   OP_DIJELI          /
     23   BROJ               2
     24   OP_EQ              ==
     25   IDN                main
     26   KR_VOID            void
     27   BROJ               5
     28   BROJ               0
     29   BROJ               3
     30   BROJ               7
     31   BROJ               4
     32   BROJ               9

                                                                                                                            856:<multiplikativni_izraz>
                                                                                                                                857:<cast_izraz>
                                                                                                                                    858:<unarni_izraz>
                                                                                                                                        859:<postfiks_izraz>
                                                                                                                                            860:<primarni_izraz>
                                                                                                                                                861:BROJ , 5
                                                                                    862:D_ZAGRADA , )
                            863:TOCKAZAREZ , ;
                864:D_VIT_ZAGRADA , }

program63.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int sum_recursive(int arr[], int n) {
    if (n <= 0) {
        return 0;
    }
    return arr[n - 1] + sum_recursive(arr, n - 1);
}

int main(void) {
    int arr[4];
    arr[0] = 1;
    arr[1] = 2;
    arr[2] = 3;
    arr[3] = 4;
    return sum_recursive(arr, 4);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                sum_recursive
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                arr
     4   L_UGL_ZAGRADA      [
     5   D_UGL_ZAGRADA      ]
     6   ZAREZ              ,
     7   IDN                n
     8   D_ZAGRADA          )
     9   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     10   KR_IF              if
     11   OP_LTE             <=
     12   BROJ               0
     13   KR_RETURN          return
     14   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     15   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     16   MINUS              -
     17   BROJ               1
     18   PLUS               +
     19   IDN                main
     20   KR_VOID            void
     21   BROJ               4
     22   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     23   BROJ               2
     24   BROJ               3

program64.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
struct Complex {
    float real;
    float imag;
};

int main(void) {
    struct Complex c1;
    struct Complex c2;
    c1.real = 1.0;
    c1.imag = 2.0;
    c2.real = 3.0;
    c2.imag = 4.0;
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_STRUCT          struct
     1   IDN                Complex
     2   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     3   KR_FLOAT           float
     4   IDN                real
     5   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     6   IDN                imag
     7   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     8   KR_INT             int
     9   IDN                main
     10   L_ZAGRADA          (
     11   KR_VOID            void
     12   D_ZAGRADA          )

     14   IDN                c2
     15   TOCKA              .
     16   OP_PRIDRUZI        =

     18   BROJ               2.0
     19   BROJ               3.0
     20   BROJ               4.0
     21   KR_RETURN          return
     22   BROJ               0

program65.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int is_even(int n) {
    return n % 2 == 0;
}

int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 6;
    if (is_even(x)) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                is_even
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                n
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   KR_RETURN          return
     7   OP_MOD             %
     8   BROJ               2
     9   OP_EQ              ==
     10   BROJ               0
     11   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     12   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     13   IDN                main
     14   KR_VOID            void
     15   IDN                x
     16   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     17   BROJ               6
     18   KR_IF              if
     19   BROJ               1

niz uniformnih znakova:

program66.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int count_digits(int n) {
    int count;
    count = 0;
    while (n != 0) {
        count = count + 1;
        n = n / 10;
    }
    return count;
}

int main(void) {
    return count_digits(12345);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                count_digits
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                n
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                count
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               0
     10   KR_WHILE           while
     11   OP_NEQ             !=
     12   PLUS               +
     13   BROJ               1
     14   OP_DIJELI          /
     15   BROJ               10
     16   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     17   KR_RETURN          return
     18   IDN                main
     19   KR_VOID            void
     20   BROJ               12345

program67.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int reverse_number(int n) {
    int reversed;
    reversed = 0;
    while (n != 0) {
        reversed = reversed * 10 + n % 10;
        n = n / 10;
    }
    return reversed;
}

int main(void) {
    return reverse_number(123);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                reverse_number
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                n
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                reversed
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               0
     10   KR_WHILE           while
     11   OP_NEQ             !=
     12   ASTERISK           *
     13   BROJ               10
     14   PLUS               +
     15   OP_MOD             %
     16   OP_DIJELI          /
     17   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     18   KR_RETURN          return
     19   IDN                main
     20   KR_VOID            void
     21   BROJ               123

program68.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int is_prime(int n) {
    int i;
    if (n <= 1) {
        return 0;
    }
    for (i = 2; i < n; i = i + 1) {
        if (n % i == 0) {
            return 0;
        }
    }
    return 1;
}

int main(void) {
    return is_prime(17);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                is_prime
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                n
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   KR_IF              if
     9   OP_LTE             <=
     10   BROJ               1
     11   KR_RETURN          return
     12   BROJ               0
     13   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     14   KR_FOR             for
     15   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     16   BROJ               2
     17   OP_LT              <
     18   PLUS               +
     19   OP_MOD             %
     20   OP_EQ              ==
     21   IDN                main
     22   KR_VOID            void
     23   BROJ               17

program69.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    int z;
    x = 5;
    y = 10;
    z = x + y * 2;
    return z;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                y
     9   IDN                z
     10   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     11   BROJ               5
     12   BROJ               10
     13   PLUS               +
     14   ASTERISK           *
     15   BROJ               2
     16   KR_RETURN          return
     17   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program7.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int a;
    int b;
    int result;
    a = 17;
    b = 5;
    result = a % b;
    return result;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst

program70.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    int z;
    x = 5;
    y = 10;
    z = (x + y) * 2;
    return z;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                y
     9   IDN                z
     10   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     11   BROJ               5
     12   BROJ               10
     13   PLUS               +
     14   ASTERISK           *
     15   BROJ               2
     16   KR_RETURN          return
     17   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program71.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    int z;
    x = 5;
    y = 10;
    z = x > y && x < 20;
    return z;
}
Lexical Tokens

indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;

     9   IDN                z

     14   OP_I               &&
     15   OP_LT              <
     16   BROJ               20
     17   KR_RETURN          return
     18   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program72.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    x = 5;
    y = 10;
    if (x > 0 && y > 0 && x < y) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                y
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               5
     11   BROJ               10
     12   KR_IF              if
     13   OP_GT              >
     14   BROJ               0
     15   OP_I               &&
     16   OP_LT              <
     17   KR_RETURN          return
     18   BROJ               1
     19   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program73.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    int y;
    x = 0;
    y = 10;
    if (x > 0 || y > 0 || x == y) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                y
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               0
     11   BROJ               10
     12   KR_IF              if
     13   OP_GT              >
     14   OP_ILI             ||
     15   OP_EQ              ==
     16   KR_RETURN          return
     17   BROJ               1
     18   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program74.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int nested_if(int x, int y) {
    if (x > 0) {
        if (y > 0) {
            if (x < y) {
                return 1;
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

int main(void) {
    return nested_if(5, 10);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                nested_if
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   IDN                x
     4   ZAREZ              ,
     5   IDN                y
     6   D_ZAGRADA          )
     7   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     8   KR_IF              if
     9   OP_GT              >
     10   BROJ               0
     11   OP_LT              <
     12   KR_RETURN          return
     13   BROJ               1
     14   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     15   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     16   IDN                main
     17   KR_VOID            void
     18   BROJ               5
     19   BROJ               10

program75.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    int j;
    int k;
    int count;
    count = 0;
    for (i = 0; i < 3; i = i + 1) {
        for (j = 0; j < 3; j = j + 1) {
            for (k = 0; k < 3; k = k + 1) {
                count = count + 1;
            }
        }
    }
    return count;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                j
     9   IDN                k
     10   IDN                count
     11   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     12   BROJ               0
     13   KR_FOR             for
     14   OP_LT              <
     15   BROJ               3
     16   PLUS               +
     17   BROJ               1
     18   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     19   KR_RETURN          return

program76.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    int sum;
    sum = 0;
    i = 0;
    while (i < 10) {
        sum = sum + i;
        i = i + 1;
        if (sum > 20) {
            break;
        }
    }
    return sum;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   IDN                sum
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               0
     11   KR_WHILE           while
     12   OP_LT              <
     13   BROJ               10
     14   PLUS               +
     15   BROJ               1
     16   KR_IF              if
     17   OP_GT              >
     18   BROJ               20
     19   KR_BREAK           break
     20   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     21   KR_RETURN          return

program77.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    i = 0;
    while (i < 10) {
        i = i + 1;
        if (i % 2 == 0) {
            continue;
        }
        if (i > 5) {
            break;
        }
    }
    return i;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               0
     10   KR_WHILE           while
     11   OP_LT              <
     12   BROJ               10
     13   PLUS               +
     14   BROJ               1
     15   KR_IF              if
     16   OP_MOD             %
     17   BROJ               2
     18   OP_EQ              ==
     19   KR_CONTINUE        continue
     20   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     21   OP_GT              >
     22   BROJ               5
     23   KR_BREAK           break
     24   KR_RETURN          return

program78.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    for (i = 0; i < 10; i = i + 1) {
        if (i == 3) {
            continue;
        }
        if (i == 7) {
            break;
        }
    }
    return i;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   KR_FOR             for
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               0
     11   OP_LT              <
     12   BROJ               10
     13   PLUS               +
     14   BROJ               1
     15   KR_IF              if
     16   OP_EQ              ==
     17   BROJ               3
     18   KR_CONTINUE        continue
     19   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     20   BROJ               7
     21   KR_BREAK           break
     22   KR_RETURN          return

program79.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int multiply_three(int a, int b, int c) {
    return a * b * c;
}

int main(void) {
    return multiply_three(2, 3, 4);
}

program8.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x > 0) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               5
     10   KR_IF              if
     11   OP_GT              >
     12   BROJ               0
     13   KR_RETURN          return
     14   BROJ               1
     15   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program80.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int add_four(int a, int b, int c, int d) {
    return a + b + c + d;
}

int main(void) {
    return add_four(1, 2, 3, 4);
}

program81.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int value;
    int *pointer;
    value = 5;
    pointer = &value;
    *pointer = *pointer + 2;
    return value;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                value
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   ASTERISK           *
     9   IDN                pointer
     10   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     11   BROJ               5
     12   AMPERSAND          &
     13   PLUS               +
     14   BROJ               2
     15   KR_RETURN          return
     16   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program82.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int add_pointer(int *ptr) {
    return *ptr + 3;
}

int main(void) {
    int number;
    int *p;
    number = 4;
    p = &number;
    return add_pointer(p);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                add_pointer
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   ASTERISK           *
     4   IDN                ptr
     5   D_ZAGRADA          )
     6   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     7   KR_RETURN          return
     8   PLUS               +
     9   BROJ               3
     10   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     11   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     12   IDN                main
     13   KR_VOID            void
     14   IDN                number
     15   IDN                p
     16   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     17   BROJ               4
     18   AMPERSAND          &

program83.c

Lexer: OK Parser error at line 4
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int value;
    int *p1;
    int **p2;
    value = 2;
    p1 = &value;
    p2 = &p1;
    **p2 = **p2 + 8;
    return value;
}

Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int values[3];
    int *ptr;
    values[0] = 1;
    values[1] = 2;
    values[2] = 3;
    ptr = values;
    ptr = ptr + 2;
    return *ptr;
}

program85.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int difference(int *end, int *start) {
    return end - start;
}

int main(void) {
    int array[4];
    int *begin;
    int *finish;
    begin = array;
    finish = array + 4;
    return difference(finish, begin);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                difference
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   ASTERISK           *
     4   IDN                end
     5   ZAREZ              ,
     6   IDN                start
     7   D_ZAGRADA          )
     8   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     9   KR_RETURN          return
     10   MINUS              -
     11   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     12   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     13   IDN                main
     14   KR_VOID            void
     15   IDN                array
     16   L_UGL_ZAGRADA      [
     17   BROJ               4
     18   D_UGL_ZAGRADA      ]
     19   IDN                begin
     20   IDN                finish
     21   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     22   PLUS               +

program86.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
void increment(int *value) {
    *value = *value + 1;
}

int main(void) {
    int counter;
    counter = 0;
    increment(&counter);
    increment(&counter);
    return counter;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_VOID            void
     1   IDN                increment
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_INT             int
     4   ASTERISK           *
     5   IDN                value
     6   D_ZAGRADA          )
     7   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   PLUS               +
     10   BROJ               1
     11   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     12   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     13   IDN                main
     14   IDN                counter
     15   BROJ               0
     16   AMPERSAND          &
     17   KR_RETURN          return

program87.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int data[2];
    int *first;
    int *second;
    data[0] = 5;
    data[1] = 7;
    first = data;
    second = data + 1;
    if (first < second) {
        return *second;
    }
    return *first;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                data
     7   L_UGL_ZAGRADA      [
     8   BROJ               2
     9   D_UGL_ZAGRADA      ]
     10   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     11   ASTERISK           *
     12   IDN                first
     13   IDN                second
     14   BROJ               0
     15   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     16   BROJ               5
     17   BROJ               1
     18   BROJ               7
     19   PLUS               +
     20   KR_IF              if
     21   OP_LT              <
     22   KR_RETURN          return
     23   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program88.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int sum(int *start, int *end) {
    int total;
    total = 0;
    while (start < end) {
        total = total + *start;
        start = start + 1;
    }
    return total;
}

int main(void) {
    int numbers[3];
    numbers[0] = 2;
    numbers[1] = 4;
    numbers[2] = 6;
    return sum(numbers, numbers + 3);
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                sum
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   ASTERISK           *
     4   IDN                start
     5   ZAREZ              ,
     6   IDN                end
     7   D_ZAGRADA          )
     8   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     9   IDN                total
     10   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     11   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     12   BROJ               0
     13   KR_WHILE           while
     14   OP_LT              <
     15   PLUS               +
     16   BROJ               1
     17   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     18   KR_RETURN          return
     19   IDN                main
     20   KR_VOID            void
     21   IDN                numbers
     22   L_UGL_ZAGRADA      [
     23   BROJ               3
     24   D_UGL_ZAGRADA      ]
     25   BROJ               2
     26   BROJ               4
     27   BROJ               6

program89.c

Lexer: OK Parser error at line 12
Source Code 
struct Pair {
    int first;
    int second;
};

int main(void) {
    struct Pair pair;
    struct Pair *pointer;
    pair.first = 3;
    pair.second = 9;
    pointer = &pair;
    return pointer->first + pointer->second;
}
Lexical Tokens

indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst

     1   IDN                Pair
     2   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {

     4   IDN                first
     5   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     6   IDN                second
     7   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

program9.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x > 0) {
        return 1;
    } else {
        return 0;
    }
}

                                                                                                        131:<primarni_izraz>
                                                                                                            132:BROJ , 0
                                                133:TOCKAZAREZ , ;
                                    134:D_VIT_ZAGRADA , }
                135:D_VIT_ZAGRADA , }

program90.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int buffer[5];
    int *ptr;
    int result;
    buffer[0] = 1;
    buffer[1] = 3;
    buffer[2] = 5;
    buffer[3] = 7;
    buffer[4] = 9;
    ptr = buffer;
    result = 0;
    while (ptr < buffer + 5) {
        result = result + *ptr;
        ptr = ptr + 1;
    }
    return result;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                buffer
     7   L_UGL_ZAGRADA      [
     8   BROJ               5
     9   D_UGL_ZAGRADA      ]
     10   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     11   ASTERISK           *
     12   IDN                ptr
     13   IDN                result
     14   BROJ               0
     15   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     16   BROJ               1
     17   BROJ               3
     18   BROJ               2
     19   BROJ               7
     20   BROJ               4
     21   BROJ               9
     22   KR_WHILE           while
     23   OP_LT              <
     24   PLUS               +
     25   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     26   KR_RETURN          return

                                                                            474:<unarni_izraz>
                                                                                475:<postfiks_izraz>
                                                                                    476:<primarni_izraz>
